title: Dead Soul Revolver
alternative_title: デッド・ソウル・リボルバー
status: デッド・ソウル・リボルバー
description:
Description :
        Kagami Kenichi meets a demon murdering a woman while taking a shortcut home from school. He is rescued by Tsukishima Miyu, a gun-wielding girl. She explains to him that the demons were once humans and the only weapon against them is guns. He soon discovers his classmate, Hirai, is a demonized human when he is attacked by him. Later on, Miyu makes a contract with Kenichi and uses his soul energy to summon a "Demon Exorcising Weapon" and kill the demon... From Baka-Updates: When a person who under goes extreme depression/anxiety, loses control, a person will become a demon consumed by darkness. Luckily there are those devoted to hunting those demons. Boy meets monster while taking shortcut home from school, is rescued by a girl with a gun. Monster gets away. Later on, girl makes contract with boy and uses his soul energy to make a big gun and kill the monster...

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.2 Chapter 10 : The Beauty, The Demon And The Exorcist
Vol.2 Chapter 9 : What It Means To Be A Demon...
Vol.1 Chapter 1 : Cleanse The Devil Division
